title: My Own Worst Enemy
description: Bethany Lewis has been in love with her brother’s best friend since the first day they met. The only problem was he was completely in love with someone else, who had died in his arms. She stood no chance against the perfect memories he held of his dead girlfriend. When she remembers that he did tell her once that he would love her one day she resolves to try and make him see her for the first time.Trick Travers has been in love with his best friend’s sister since the first day they met. The only problem is that one tragic event after another has blocked her mind from remembering all the years that they were in love. Now she looks at him like he’s a stranger and his heart aches to show her the way back to his arms again.What would happen if everything you thought was reality was actually just a fabrication of your own mind? Would it stop you from loving the one person you were destined to be with?
author: Emma L.  Smith
